place_description: Flav's Coffee & Italian Market is a small local business selling fresh ground coffee, panini, Italian imports, cannoli, used books and more! Located in Indian Trail at 5719-E Hwy 74. Thank you for stopping by!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is one of my favorites to have a good coffee, and not to mention the panini, from Italian girl to the rest of the world, this place is the best!
Great Paninis with real Italian meats and homemade bread made daily. We'll be back.
Nice little cafe/shop with awesome staff. Refreshing in an area overflowing with chain fast food places. Pesto chicken panini was amazing. Hope they keep permanently.
I found this spot randomly and was not disappointed the Mob Boss is so good I didn't even leave the parking lot.

My husband & I just happened to find this place for lunch. We love locally owned smaller restaurants. We ordered the Godfather & Americano paninis + coffee. All was soo good!! Service was great as well!
Quaint authentic Italian coffee house and market

Such an adorable coffee shop and market.  We shared a Turkey Panini Sandwich that was so fresh and tasty.  We saved room for dessert and got a fresh cannoli and a flavored coffee, which was delicious.

They also have tables outside to sit when the weather is warmer.  The service was outstanding.  I will definately be back for lunch and some yummy treats.

Side note: I forgot to take a picture of the sandwich until I was almost done as it looked so good I wanted to eat it right away, so you will see a half eaten sandwich

What a great little place! It has amazing Italian bits, the sandwiches are, OMG DELICIOUS!!! The coffee is just as tasty, the authentic Italian atmosphere adds so much! This place will definitely be added to my usuals!
Perfect Italian cuisine at great prices
They have the BEST chicken pesto sandwich ever. Their ingredients are fresh!!!

Excellent food and customer service.
Always fresh bread and homemade
This is a nice spot to get coffee, I had got their iced latte and I sandwiches that they have in the case look huge!

Cozy cafe with delicious, authentic Italian food. Flavio makes you feel at home. Try the vinny sandwhich! They also have homemade pasta and other items shipped from Italy to take home/or gift to others. Love it here!!
Super recomendado
Excellent place... amazing coffee and food..!! Totally recommended if you around this area to stop and have a great time.
Great place, just came here for a cuppa tea, and I like the vibe, if you never been here before! It's truly good place to try
Awesome place!Awesome coffee!Awesome Service! Highly recommended
Great experience everything.  A panini and coffee are a must.
Always a pleasure to stop by and see Flavio. Amazing panini!!
Great food and friendly service in a small charming shop. Some indoor seating.
Delicious!!
The cutest corner of italy in NC! I love coming here for a coffee and their delicious paninis. The owners are always friendly and excited to serve you.

Stumbled into this quaint little shop while visiting Indian Trail. I can only assume the man behind the counter was an owner; he was genuine, excited and eager to provide a top notch experience. The coffee was good and "The Vinny" was the best sandwich I have ever eaten. The bread is made in house and every ingredient felt fresh. 10 out of 10 will be back.
Great panini sandwich, very tasty, and a great atmosphere.
We love going to Flavs for coffee and a sandwich.  He is a great guy and always makes us feel welcome.
Coffee shop with used books for sale and authentic delicious Italian sandwiches & cannolis -- 5 stars all around!

Seriously some of the best coffee and Italian sandwiches I have had!! This place is so slept on and such a hidden gem in Indian Trail!! Prices are affordable, owner works at the shop, and they have a store where you can buy authentic Italian items!! Must come and try them!! #supportsmallbusinesses

The Panini's are awesome, bread is baked locally and you can tell the quality is excellent. The owner and young lady serving were very sweet and helpful. Some cool imported Italian products to choose from as well. Well worth the visit. Will be back.
Came in wanting to try a new place and everything tasted amazing will definitely come back
Great local shop for locals to visit and support. Friendly staff and delicious tiramisu!
My daughter and myself, it's our favorite meeting spot

Wow! I had no idea there was legit Italian food in Indian Trail! Italian owner and it shows. I was just looking for a coffee shop and found so much more. I ended up having a cappuccino and the Vinny (Italian panini) and it was incredible. You need to come here and check it out!

Decent espresso, but unethical ownership. The prices posted at the entrance are the lowest, to lure you in. The prices posted above the counter are higher (than the ones posted by the entrance). The prices they actually ring up are even higher still (than those posted above the counter). All for the same products. Certainly appears deliberate, and hence fraudulent.

Note: This concern does not include any added coffee flavors or other add-ons. I get that those may cost extra.
Super stop! Just passing through, found Flav's while making a u-turn. Highly recommend.
Great coffee & sandwiches, I will be a returning customer.  If your in the area you must stop by and give it a try .

I don't know what kind of bread they use for the panini's, but it's amazing! I got the black market panini and it was so simple but so delicious. Both of the gentleman that were there working were wonderful and who I'm assuming is the owner described all the paninis to me because he saw me struggling to pick. They also had a bunch of different retail items like sweets and pasta you can buy. Will definitely be going back to try their coffee and another kind of panini!
Just discovered this shop. Really liked the atmosphere!

Absolutely wonderful!  We were in the area car shopping and wanted a place to grab some great coffee and unique food with WiFi.  We came to the right spot!  Great people, coffee and food!  The Mob Boss has an excellent flavor!!  Love Flav's story...the American Dream!   Highly recommend!
Amazing spot! The owner is very welcoming and nice! He made sure we enjoyed everything and provided great recommendations. I enjoyed a Red Bull soda and the Vinny sandwich. Highly recommend!

Every summer my nieces and nephews come to town for the week and their first request is to stop by Flav's for coffees and cannolis.  We especially love that they have a great front porch for all of us to sit and relax on.  Love that Flav has brought a little bit of Italy here to NC!
The best place to enjoy a good coffee and to relax.
Amazing food and coffee. We will be back. Thank you!
Just ordered three paninnis to go. Delicious.
Flav is a real gentleman running an excellent little shop. The cappuccino was spot on, worth a trip in the pouring rain this morning!
Went here today for the first time, and will definitely be returning here for breakfast or lunch, the cappuccino was good and the sandwiches delicious, the owner very friendly.

This coffee shop is 8 mins from me, so I gave them a try. I'm glad I did.

I loved their coffee, service, and food. The inside was set up nicely with seating and WIFI. They offered to adjust my coffee with flavor if I needed it, but it was good, so need to adjust!

I'm trying the cannoli next!

My wife and I loved coming here today for lunch and coffee! First time visiting. We both ordered a panini and a coffee. The owner was very welcoming and friendly. The paninis were amazing. We ordered the Vinny and the Mob Boss paninis. We also enjoyed the shop. So many Italian treats, pastas, and sauces. We will be back!
Love love love the homemade bread. Coffee was delicious !!
Flav is great! Great everything! Their Panini is phenomenally phenomenal!

Growing up in the NY/NJ area, it felt like home walking in. The food and people made it even better, everything was delicious and customer service was outstanding. The owner was great, friendly, and very attentive to all his customers. Highly highly recommend.
They just expanded indoor space and it is amazing!
We just came back from Italy and Flav's gives us the same atmosphere like we never left! Delicious panini's and cappuccino!

I was at a preschool graduation at a nearby park and was checking my phone to clear the GPS when a photo of a sandwich from Flav's taken by Courtney Kim popped up. Immediately headed to Flav's for an Italian sandwich. Bread baked on the premises! I love being in the South but I do miss the genuine Italian food that was so plentiful when I lived in the CT-NY-NJ region. I have not had anything that I consider true Italian since leaving Connecticut over 20 years ago (think Bimonte's Pizza, Sally's and Frank Pepe's in New Haven)

I showed them the picture of what brought me there and then picked a non-vegetarian version of the photo I had seen. It has prosciutto, arugula, one or two more meats and shaved Parmesan.  That was all I could hear the shop owner day, I was too busy drooling over what I was about to enjoy. He toasted my sandwich, I grabbed one little pastry and headed home. My sandwich was still warm when I got home and I tore into it, didn't come up for sure until I had eaten almost half of it. Hence, no photo to share.

I will be going back tomorrow for freshly baked sfogliatellas (known as clams to those of us who can't pronounce the word) - he does them only on Thursdays and Saturdays. As satiated as I am after my sandwich, my mouth is watering right now in anticipation of what tomorrow is going to bring. I'm about 13 miles away from Flav's here in Monroe NC, but it is worth the trip and I expect I will be going there many more times to try so many of the other sandwiches I saw on the menu.

My husband and I hadn't been in this strip of shops for well over a year...so glad we made it back! The atmosphere and food is top-notch. We were welcomed like family. Stop in and enjoy a coffee, panini, and pastry...you'll be glad you did! See you all again soon .
Staff were so sweet and friendly. My iced carne macchiato was very good and the cannoli was amazing ! Definitely coming back for more !

Got the iced caramel macchiato and a panini with tiramisu for dessert. It was so good! Bread was made fresh and it was delicious. Flavio was extremely nice and welcoming! Will be back for sure! 10/10 recommend.

If you are missing Italy sometimes visit the Flav's cafe. Best paninis I've tried in America 
Coffe is very good too.
And the atmosphere is very homey
Definitely will be back
Now THAT is a breakfast sandwich. Come to Flav's. Now.
Great place! Coffee was great!! A++

I'm not even gonna exaggerate, Flav's panini changed my life. His coffee is amazing, the food is amazing, I even bought some pasta and that was amazing. The atmosphere is great, you can tell Flav really enjoys meeting new guests. I'm so glad I stumbled upon this place and I can't wait to go back. Ottimo!
Great coffee and conversation!
Panini was excellent!

My Americano was perfect, and my wife loved her chai latte. I frequently burn my tongue on the first sip, but the temperature was perfect and the flavor complex. Good feel and great service, he makes you feel welcome.

Wonderful place with authentic italian products and owner, a must visit!
Excellent client service, friendly and personable 
Have an espresso coffee with a fresh cannoli! Support quality local businesses

Wanted to try coffee from a local spot and got the iced vanilla latte - EXCEEDED my expectations. Tastes amazing and not overly sweet or watered down like every other coffee shop. Can't wait to visit, see their cute little shop, and try out their other items!

I love the atmosphere here, it's always so welcoming and inviting! The coffee tastes fresh and flavorful too. Honestly, the price is as good as Dunkin and Starbucks but tastes 1000x better AND you don't have to wait in a long drive through line. I love the caramel macchiato (hot or iced) and the espressos come in cute little yellow cups

Great coffee!
Great prices!
And amazing atmosphere!

Definitely a MUST to check out if your in the area and in hankering for some coffee or good food.

I have waited almost 10 years to find  Canoli like they are up in New York and this is the place!!!!  The owners are kind, caring and very hard working. YOU MUST STOP HERE!!! MAKE IT A DESTINATION PLACE. You will love it.
You NEED to visit this place! Great coffee, sandwiches and other food specials! The owners are so nice and welcoming!
the BEST paninis. Comfortable spot.
Obsessed with this little place! Quality products and great service! The Vinny is 10/10

We love Flav's, the food and atmosphere are great. My husband and I love to grab a coffee, sandwich, and play cards in the shop. The food is authentic and delicious and the Italian market is my favorite!! I can't say enough great things!

Delicious coffee & friendly service! Was very happy with my iced latte - still one of the tastiest in the CLT/Monroe area in my opinion. The paninis are great too, I ordered the Vinny and loved how fresh everything was! Very tasty! The shop itself has lovely Italian treats and a beautiful set up!
Just ordered meatballs since I am low carbing it plus a side of broccoli rabe. Both were some of the best I have ever eaten. I could eat those things every day.
Great place, excellent paninis. Flav bakes his own bread and knows how to make a great sandwich. Would recommend!

Boyfriend said (and I quote), "This might be the best sandwich I've ever had in my life."
Coffee was delicious as well, and the owner was so hospitable and nice! Go here!!!

Authentic Italian Coffee Shop! When I walked up, the porch had some of the Italian family members visiting in a nice spot for being outside.

The reading nook was very comfy and great for getting a bit of work done while sipping on my perfectly created cappuccino.

The Italian food items for sale were neatly displayed and competitively priced. At the recommendation of my Sardinian 'daughter' we picked up a traditional Christmas cake for her American grandparents.

Everyone was very friendly and I can't wait to come back and enjoy a toasty panini made to order.

Such a charming place, homemade bread and imported Italian meats that I can't find anywhere else. Best cappuccino too. Flav , the owner makes you feel at home. Great neighborhood place and cheap. Will definitely be back.
absolutely incredible!! the best coffee I've ever had
I've been here many many times, ever since he opened last March.  Not once have I been disappointed wether I get coffee or some cannolis.  And this man is super sweet and has good jokes!
Amazing service and great food and coffee!

Flav has one of the best cannolis I have ever had. Can't wait to try his homemade Tiramisu. The Backyard Panini was excellent. Looking forward to trying more stuff here. Such a great find!
Michele
Owner and food are amazing! Sliced meat selection is top notch! Highly recommended! A little slice of Italy!
friendly and really good authentic Italian food!  good espresso coffee, good place
The Caramel Latte Macchiato is so good! I highly recommend.

This adorable coffee shop offers delicious coffee and so much more!!!!
It's a quiet place for meetings or just relaxing.
Best of all, it has a magic portal that takes you to Italy....shhh it's a secret
Excellent customer service,  nice ambience, the food is fresh and delicious
Really welcoming atmosphere. Flav really made my day. Can't wait to go back with my family for more of their items.
Cool little spot. Support local.

Update! Flav opened up a larger space right next door and I have been longing to visit. Finally had the perfect moment to take my daughter on a hot coco date and we LOVED it!  Full of Italian Market goodies and a warm ambiance that just made us feel happy inside and out. It is a perfect fresh approach to the idea of Cafe, right down to the little fairy door leading to Italy.

(Going to make a plan to take the kids regularly and do some of our homeschool lessons inside by the window or out on the porch.)
Great espressos and cannolis!
Awesome authentic Italian coffee and foods. Will definitely be returning.
Flavio has created a delightful cafe atmosphere and he's always happy to make up a hot cup of my favorite.
The sandwiches are authentic Italian and amazing! Espresso is strong and flavorful, exaxtly the way it should be.  Cannoli is heavenly! I will be back!!

I had an amazing experience today at Flav's! I had a networking meeting with a colleague and she suggested that we go to Flav's. Having never been there, I didn't know what to expect. It is a clean and cute little shop!! My coffee was great and the cannoli, I cannot even describe how delicious it was!! My colleague had a Nutella croissant and it looked great too. They also had lots of authentic Italian grocery items for purchase as well. Additionally, they have a huge bookcase filled with books and a little shelf of games you can borrow while you're there. I would recommend this place to anyone.
Flavio was very nice and had great suggestions of things to try in the market. The coffee and croissant were very fresh

Lovely little asthetic spot with good company and good vibes. You can feel time slow as you stand inside which is a rare and priceless feeling these days. Just moved to the relative area..will be a regular in supporting this business! Thank you! :)

My sister loves her Americano! And even though tea isn't the employee's strong suit, my tea was hot enough, not boiling. (I only just found out you're not supposed to boil the water.) So I'm super satisfied with my tea. The place is cozy with really good music, lovely pictures of Italy that you can buy, books that are available to just read or purchase for $3 (paperback) or $4 (hardback), Italian food items, ice cream treats, and games to play. I highly recommend this place!
Great shop, fresh coffee always!

The Best Coffee!!! I travel out of my way to get my coffee from Flav's. The coffeeshop also has an abundant array of tasty Italian delights. A friend requests 2 of the same coffee each time I visit,  it's that good!!
Best coffee since returning from Italy. Just walking in made me feel like I was back.
Delicious coffee & cool shop!  Owner is super nice.
So glad I stopped in to get a coffee and a snack. Super friendly owners, delicious coffee, and really amazing cookies. I will definitely be back and encourage everyone to stop in and give it a try!
Yummy coffee and friendly owner

Tried their coffee, the owner is really nice and friendly. Love the imported items he carries for customers to try. Coffee was delicious, he made it just the way I asked! They also have outside seating that are nice and shaded.
Best coffee in the area, easily better than the surrounding chain stores, and, at an equatable price point! The owner is genuinely a great guy who knows his art. I can't recommend this place enough!!
Everytime I'm in the area I'm there to enjoy my coffee and a cannoli
Great coffee
Best almond milk latte I've ever had!
Really nice owner, definitely a people person that makes a bomb coffee with that nice Italian kindness
The coffee is amazing! The owner is an amazing guy who I can tell really cares about his customers and his products! The cannolis are epic as well! Defiantly recommend this place!
Coffee is delicious and the cannolis are amazing.
Italian owned, perfect place to enjoy some legit Italian coffee on the go. The cannoli just make the deal sweeter!
Perfect Italian atmosphere at Falv's Coffee! I love Flav's espresso and cappuccino ... and don't forget to taste the delicious cannoli they serve in this amazing coffee corner!!!
Cool little coffee shop with authentic Italian espresso among other options. Check it out, take your friends. It will be our first stop on visits to Charlotte.
